discription: I am working here as a senior software engineer for 2+ year. Completed one internal project and mainly working on Siemens cloud projects, worked using the latest front - end technologies like Angular 6/7/9. And backend technologies like node Js and PostgreSQL. Here I got a great exposure in AI/ML, NLP and Backend technologies. I started working in Siemens as deputation from Ideas 2 IT and the moved to siemens own roles.

projects.discription: SIMATIC MindApps take advantage of the data harnessed by MindSphere, our IoT operating system, in order to bring you closer to your machines, plants, and automation processes, whether you are overseeing global activities or operating locally within the plant. And if you are an equipment manufacturer, SIMATIC MindApps will, too, transform your business, allowing you to guarantee better service and availability to your clients
responsibilities: Technical discussion with partners about the implementation.
Code standards and code quality of the product.

discription: I am working here as front-end developer for 2 years. Completed three projects, worked using latest front-end technologies like Angular 2/4, SASS, Angular CLI etc. All three projects are web applications.

projects.discription: Search Force is a digital advertising technology and services company that helps enterprise businesses reach the right person at the right time with the most relevant message. Its works on oracle DB with java back-end.
responsibilities: Front end architecture of the application.
Integration of components to the application.

projects.discription: Business to business portal web application for CANON. It work as an online ordering system between partners and canon. It works on oracle DB.
responsibilities: Front end architecture of the application.
Installation and setup of Angular CLI

projects.discription: An Angular 2 web ERP application. It is the core business process management software for Kerala cricket association. It contains about 17 modules.
responsibilities: Installation and setup of Angular CLI

projects.discription: Android hybrid application developed using Angular JS and ionic framework.  Test Sutra is an application suite, which help organizations, streamline their Testing, Quality and Safety Inspections.
responsibilities: Front end changes as per request.
